description.@value: Personal Learning Record Store (LRS) allows individuals to store and manage their own learning records in their cloud drive. PLRS allows individuals to keep track of their learning activities, achievements, and progress through their whole life. They can easily share these data with others if, or when, they choose to.

functionalities.@value: Export learning traces from LMS to PLRS (in LMS frontend)
Import learning traces from LMS to PLRS (in PLRS frontend)
Synchronize PLRS data with external LRS
Local access to data for edge computing
